import Layout from '../components/common/layout' import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import axios from 'axios' import Swal from 'sweetalert2' import withReactContent from 'sweetalert2-react-content' import Router from 'next/router' export default function Index(props) { const [register,setRegister] = useState(false) const [datos,setDatos] = useState({ email: '' }) const [nombreEvento,setNombreEvento] = useState('') useEffect(() => { getData() },[]) const getData = async()=>{ const {data} = await axios({ url: 'https://platform.medicalbeyond.com/graphql', method: 'post', data: { query: ` query { event( id: 1 ) { title start speakers { id name } } } ` } }) console.log(data) setNombreEvento(data.data.event.title) } const handleInputChange = (event) => { // console.log(event.target.name) // console.log(event.target.value) setDatos({ ...datos, [event.target.name] : event.target.value }) console.log(datos) } const registerForm = () => { console.log(hola) } return (

{nombreEvento}

7:30 pm Ciudad de México,Guatemala,Costa Rica, Honduras

10:30 pm Argentina, Brasil, Chile, Paraguay
